text: @DHSCgovuk @theJeremyVine @GOVUK From a government that has claimed to change the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme date when in reality they didn't, I find this post hilarious. Maybe the govt. should stop bulls**tting the public and maybe we'd trust you!
